query:
SELECT
                s.name AS "source",
                pm.type_id,
                i.name AS item_name,
                i.volume,
                pm.quantity,
                remaining,
                price
            FROM market_orders_latest mol
            JOIN project_market pm
              ON pm.type_id = mol.type_id
            JOIN items i
              ON i.type_id = pm.type_id
            JOIN structures s
              ON s.structure_id = mol.structure_id
            WHERE pm.source IS NULL
              AND pm.cost IS NULL
              AND project_id = $1
              -- Minerals
              AND group_id = 18
              -- Exclude Mercoxit
              AND i.type_id != 11399
              AND is_buy = false
            ORDER BY price ASC
